### Covariate `r covariate.name`

```{r}
output <- object$covariate.associations[[covariate.name]]$output
for (name in names(output)) {
    cat("", name, sep="\n")
    print(output[[name]])
}
```

```{r}
fig.width <- 1 + opts_chunk$get("fig.width")
```

```{r,message=F,fig.width=fig.width}
(object$covariate.associations[[covariate.name]]$plot)
```
